attributes.action: Reduce expensive insurance premiums for new pass HGV drivers.
attributes.additional_details: By reducing high insurance premiums for new pass HGV drivers, it will not only help to tackle the issue of unemployment, it will also help to tackle the HGV driver shortage in the UK.
attributes.background: HGV drivers who have recently passed their HGV  driving test are facing unemployment due to recruitment agencies and haulage companies refusing to pay expensive insurance premiums to employ them. This is due to the lack of driving experience new pass HGV drivers have.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about motor insurance prices are a matter for insurance providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
